website_summaries.verdict: This functional and cute high chair mat is easy to wipe clean and has a cute design.
pros: Made from a BPA-free linen, cotton, and polyester blend
Includes an anti-slip backing to keep the mat in place under your table or high chair
Doubles as a kid's table cloth
cons: Certain craft materials or waters can leak through

customer_reviews.title: Splat Mat for under eating area or artwork area
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a good quality Mat that I could easily slip under my toddlers art easel or even her eating area. This mat is actually really nicely made. I picked the animal pattern, but you have many others to choose from. The material is thick and not cheap looking at all. Price is reasonable. I like that the back side has little dots that prevent it from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Sarit

customer_reviews.title: cleans easily and holds up to our washing machine + dryer
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute and functional. Exactly as described: slip resistant, cleans easily and holds up to our washing machine + dryer. Is very large and covers a significant portion of floor underneath our highchair so catches the vast majority of anything our baby drops. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JGeff

customer_reviews.title: Neat and cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. OK, at first, I didn't think it made much of a difference, I used to have to clean the floor after each meal, now I had to wipe a different surface... Well, it's an alternative when you try to get a bit lazy. I sometimes wipe after a whole day's feedings. All we do is to avoid the area since now it's a bit more obvious. It is work to take it off especially when you have heavy high chair like we do. But once off you have a clean floor, relatively.
customer_reviews.author: Yan L.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it !
customer_reviews.text: I really should know this may earlier ! It’s a perfect thing for those who have kids at home ! It’s totally protect my floor and makes the house looks clean ! I should say thank you to the guy who invented this thing ! By the way , this product’s quality is very good , I will recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Exactly as described. Easily washable, hang to dry and has grippers on the bottom to keep mat from moving or sliding when you step on it or move the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these floor mats that I purchased two. When they arrived, I quickly unfolded them and noticed that the colors from the animals transferred to other parts of the mat. For example, the eye of the giraffe was also in the top gray portion of the mat against which it was folded. Overall, it seemed the ink used was of poor quality and made me wonder how it would actually hold up to messes. I returned both mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very adorable mate . It is so big that my baby spilled every thing on it. There is no need for me to sweep and mop the floor after every meal. The dots under the mat can keep it from moving. Very good design. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE having this underneath my little one's highchair. Not only is it super cute, but if crumbs fall on it while feeding him, I literally just pick it up and go outside and shake it off (obviously if something spills I wipe up, but again easy!). Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not quite what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: this is a very large Matt. And it is not one that can be easily wiped down. It needs to be washed after each use so it is not exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: I Love this, this is not only functional but cute ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love this, this is not only functional but cute too, it stays in place, we have wood floor and our baby keeps dropping his bottle on the floor and this is a great way to prevent the floor getting damage and keeping it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, doesn’t run
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, doesn’t run. It stays in place and easy to wash when needed. Not waterproof put the two layers of cloth hold things pretty good. I needed a very large mat, they have a smaller version that’s waterproof. But this one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael G Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It makes cleaning up after mealtimes a lot easier and the pattern is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the mat and that it protects the floor from food, however it says it’s waterproof and it is NOT. This is for my 2 year old because we got new flooring and i ordered this to protect it, any liquid goes right through it.
customer_reviews.author: dalila

customer_reviews.title: Don't wash it!
customer_reviews.text: After using it for like 2 months I have machine washed 3 times and now I am about to throw it away. Doesn't stay in the floor... I was thinking maybe is better to put some puzzle foam thingy in the floor than this. It looks like an old rug now
customer_reviews.author: Jorge E. Arias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, great for putting my son on the floor with his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Mat
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Granddaughter drops stuff on it. When she is done, I just take it outside and shake. Washes up nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ricciardi

customer_reviews.title: Cover large area
customer_reviews.text: Very large and easy to clean, the animal print is so cute with soft colors, fun for the mom to “use” and for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: Not slipery!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are amazing but you can’t take off the mess. And I washed higher thn 30degre now it’s not waterproof anymore
customer_reviews.author: Belma Gurler Kolcalar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended. Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Having this under my 1 year old boy’s high chair makes my life easier. It’s waterproof and it light, not to mention you can wash it in the washing machine👍🏼👏🏽. Love this and my baby loves it too🥰
customer_reviews.author: Syrene Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great mat to place under the high chair for when ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mat to place under the high chair for when my lil one eats - so easy to wipe and clean! Planning to use it when bub is also a bit older for creative arts/painting time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and doesn’t slip
customer_reviews.text: I liked the anti slip feature the most and it’s easy to clean😊
customer_reviews.author: Ree3057

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t want to get your floor dirty? Then you must have it! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bian

customer_reviews.title: my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: it's actually much bigger than i thought it is good quality and easy to get rid of dirt. i love the pattern on it which is so cute! and it definitely could last forever.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: ... right through onto our carpet so the mat is useless against paint
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 y/o placed a marker on the mat and it bled right through onto our carpet so the mat is useless against paint, markers and liquids. I guess if you avoid those, you are ok.
customer_reviews.author: DP

product_meta.title: Zicac 51" Splat Mat for Under High Chair - Anti-Slip, Washable, Portable Picnic Mat and Table Cloth, Art Crafts Floor/Carpet Protector (Giraffe)
feature_bullets: LARGE HIGH CHAIR SPLAT MAT - The 51 x 51 inches large floor mat is big enough that it catches most thrown splatberries. Made of nice waterproof fabric, It will keep your floor clean.
NON SLIP SPILL MAT - Grip well on hardwood floors, the anti-slip back cloth prevent the mat to move easily. Keep the baby more secure.
WASHABLE KIDS SPLAT MAT - Easier to shake off foods like fish, rice, egg, etc.rather than get off hardwood floor. It’s easy to clean and can be machined washed and dry quickly.
HIGH QUALITY SPLAT PAD - The material is durable and stain-resistant, 100% polyester, lead free, BPA free and phthalate free.

MULTIPLE USES - With cute cartoon giraffe pattern design, our baby splat mat can be used as a floor mat in living room, nursery, or even outside terrace or on the sand. It is Light weight and folds compactly, ideal for travel.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
